paper_abstract: This note shows that the input targets of proposed model by Kuosmanen and Kazemi Matin (2009) (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.ejor.2007.09.040 and http://dx.doLorg/10.1016/j.omega.2008.11.002) may not be less than the input targets of proposed model by Lozano and Villa (2006) (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.cor.2005.02.031). (C) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on integer-valued radial model in DEA
